name: HAVE AT YOU!!!
description:
Home is where your Castle for Bald: The Inhaler. While pondering his existence and potential humanity, help Bald ward off evil solicitors and Victor Ballmont using your power to throw wine glasses at your enemies. Can you find out what is hidden within the sellers miserable pile of secrets? Play on and experience this run and gun parody of our favorite vampire hunting series.

Controls:

w - Jump
a- Left
d - Right
Left Mouse Button - Throw Wine Glass

Aiming and Firing of Wine Glasses is controlled using the Mouse
